title: Research Overview
content: Smart city services are deeply embedded in modern cities aiming to enhance various aspects of citizensâ€™ lives. My research focuses on addressing real-world societal challenges related to equity, privacy, resiliency and sustainability by developing cyber(e.g., machine learning algorithms)-physical(e.g., transportation) systems.

title: EV Simulator (By Kush Aswani, Yuefei Chen, and Guang Wang)
content: For this project, we are trying to design an interactive tool for electric vehicle simulation.
